entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:24 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
